body: Let's use `Float` instead of `Integer` as integer gradients are a bit iffy (in fact, we don't backprop through integer tensors in Python anymore - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/f63750645826df65b05cad505546a86f0e347674, yes, yes, I know, it would be great if we were able to share that logic more easily :) But for now, let's at least have the example use a more realistic `Float`?
body_html: Let's use Float instead of Integer as integer gradients are a bit iffy (in fact, we don't backprop through integer tensors in Python anymore - f637506, yes, yes, I know, it would be great if we were able to share that logic more easily :) But for now, let's at least have the example use a more realistic Float?
